intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Open Tools Platform. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about our policy, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us.

info_collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
info_collect.content: Most of our tools process data locally within your browser. This means that for many tools, your data never leaves your device. However, we may collect certain information such as: usage data (IP address, browser type, pages visited) and cookies to improve our services and show relevant advertisements.

info_usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
info_usage.content: We use the information we collect to: provide and maintain our services, improve and personalize your experience, analyze usage patterns, and serve advertisements that help keep this platform free for everyone.

data_security.title: 4. Data Security
data_security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, please also remember that we cannot guarantee that the internet itself is 100% secure.

third_party.title: 5. Third-Party Services
third_party.content: We may use third-party service providers to monitor and analyze the use of our service, or to display advertisements. These third parties have access to your personal information only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete the data we hold about you.

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may contact us through our official GitHub repository.

acceptance.content: By accessing or using Open Tools Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

service_desc.title: 2. Description of Service
service_desc.content: Open Tools Platform provides a collection of developer tools and utilities. These services are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. We reserve the right to withdraw or amend our service without notice.

user_conduct.title: 3. User Conduct
user_conduct.content: You agree not to use the tools for any illegal purposes or in a manner that could damage, disable, or impair the service. You are responsible for all data you process using our tools.

disclaimer.content: The materials on this website are provided 'as is'. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.

modifications.content: We may revise these Terms of Service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these Terms of Service.

governing_law.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that State or location.
